question:
I am going to name a number of organizations. For each one, could you tell me how much confidence you have in them: is it a great deal of confidence, quite a lot of confidence, not very much confidence or none at all?:

The government (in your municipality)
raw_output:
My confidence in the government in my municipality depends on its effectiveness, transparency, and ability to address local issues. If I believe it performs well and earns my trust, I would choose A; if I think it generally manages well but has room for improvement, B; if I have doubts about its competence or integrity, C; or if I have no trust at all due to past issues or dissatisfaction, D. Since I generally trust my municipal government to handle local concerns adequately, I would lean towards quite a lot of confidence.

ANSWER: B
